title: Parking Cap

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a number to place a parking cap on a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- For the rest of the game, until you die, you select a new target, or your target dies, all visits on your target will fail after that amount of visitors have went to your target's house.
- You learn every player that visits your target, based on priority order.

desc:
Post 3795
*What, we can only fit so many people.*
